title: Netizens React As 'Trump Dance' Goes Viral: 'Taken The Culture Back'
content: The trendy move stems from an awkward mishmash of steps performed by Trump during the election to the tune of YMCA song.

title: Putin Responds To Biden's Missile Approval By Changing Nuclear Doctrine

title: Putin Allows Broader Use Of Nuclear Weapons On 1,000th Day Of Ukraine War
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday signed a decree broadening the scope of when Moscow can use nuclear weapons in a clear message to the West and Ukraine.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday signed a decree broadening the scope of when Moscow can use nuclear weapons in a clear message to the West and Ukraine.

title: Gaza Plunges Into Lawlessness As 100 Aid Trucks "Violently Looted": UN
content: The drivers were forced to unload the trucks at gunpoint, aid workers were injured, and vehicles were extensively damaged.

title: UK Vet Dies By Suicide After Rich Clients Euthanise Pets To Save Money
content: Dr Ellis had tricked a veterinary nurse into giving him the deadly medication by claiming that he needed it to put down a friend's large dog.
summary: Dr Ellis had tricked a veterinary nurse into giving him the deadly medication by claiming that he needed it to put down a friend's large dog.

title: Apple Offers $100 Million To Undo Indonesia iPhone 16 Ban
content: Apple Inc. has increased its offer to invest in Indonesia by almost tenfold, according to people familiar with the matter, in the US tech giant's latest bid to persuade the government to lift its sales ban on the iPhone 16.
summary: Apple Inc. has increased its offer to invest in Indonesia by almost tenfold, according to people familiar with the matter, in the US tech giant's latest bid to persuade the government to lift its sales ban on the iPhone 16.

title: Chinese Student Commutes Weekly Between China And Australia For Love
content: For three months, Xu Guangli commuted weekly between his home in Shandong province, China, and RMIT University in Melbourne, Australia.
summary: For three months, Xu Guangli commuted weekly between his home in Shandong province, China, and RMIT University in Melbourne, Australia.

title: Do The Donald! Trump Dance Takes US Sport By Storm

title: Watch: World Bank Chief's Joke Leaves Modi, Macron In Splits In Brazil

title: UK PM Stays Quiet On Ukraine's Use Of Long-Range Missiles Against Russia

title: The Growing Threat Of Deepfake Pornography: How To Protect Yourself
content: "All we have to have is just a human form to be a victim." This statement from attorney Carrie Goldberg, who specialises in online abuse and sex crimes, captures the heightened risks posed by deepfake pornography in the era of artificial intelligence

title: Boeing To Fire Over 2,000 Employees In US, Home To Its Oldest Facilities
content: The US aviation giant Boeing sent out its first redundancy notifications on Monday as part of a previously announced plan to cut 10 percent of its global workforce.

title: Climate Change Threatens Amazon Rainforest As Sand Dunes Appear

title: "Can't Get Him Out Of Here": Can The Donald Trump-Elon Musk 'Bromance' Last?
content: Elon Musk has been an ever-present sidekick for President-elect Donald Trump since the US election at the start of the month. But can the bromance between world's wealthiest man and the soon-to-be US president survive some major policy differences?
summary: Elon Musk has been an ever-present sidekick for President-elect Donald Trump since the US election at the start of the month. But can the bromance between world's wealthiest man and the soon-to-be US president survive some major policy differences?

title: Pakistan Imposes Section 144 Ahead Of Protest Threat By Imran Khan's Party
content: Pakistan federal authorities have outlawed all sorts of public gatherings in the capital region for two months ahead of a planned protest by jailed former prime minister Imran Khan's party.
summary: Pakistan federal authorities have outlawed all sorts of public gatherings in the capital region for two months ahead of a planned protest by jailed former prime minister Imran Khan's party.

title: Opinion: Team Trump: There's Method To This Madness

title: At PM Modi's Meet With UK PM, Push To Extradite Vijay Mallya, Nirav Modi

title: Biden Out Of Picture As World Leaders Meet For Photo-Op At G20 Summit

title: Once Worth $30 Billion, Archegos Founder Says He's Just a Millionaire Now
content: Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang, whose family office's soaring portfolio briefly made him worth more than $30 billion, said he now only has around $55 million.
summary: Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang, whose family office's soaring portfolio briefly made him worth more than $30 billion, said he now only has around $55 million.
